<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>
        <code_url_2/>
        <details/>

        <example_url/>
        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001082</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>var unique_num = gs.nowDateTime();
createCI ();

function createCI () {
   var ci = new GlideRecord('u_cmdb_ci_cage');
   ci.name = 'New Cross Connect-' + unique_num; 
   ci.insert();
// var id = ci.insert();
// workflow.scratchpad.ci_id = id;
// use the commented code to return the sys_id of the new record to create // relations on the cmdb_rel_ci table between the new cross connect and the // cages automaticially
}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>Workflow</script_type>
        <short_description>To Create a CI in a Workflow (Run Script Action)</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
